title: No Occupation For A Lady
description: Meeting Alistair Devlin, London's most eligible bachelor, causes Victoria Bretton no end of problems. Masking her attraction is even more difficult than concealing her alter ego—playwright Valentine Lawe—not to mention the fact that this man's unsettling gaze is causing her the most terrible writer's block!Alistair's not in the market for love…but he can't help but be beguiled by Victoria and intrigued by the secrets she's hiding. As they grow closer the lines between fact and fiction become blurred. Can she be the heroine of her very own happy ending?
author: Gail Whitiker
